extension.description: Install this module on any Joomla site you'd like your ads to display. Open the zone and find the URL and ID at the bottom and enter it on this module's backend

field.name: website_url
field.label: Website URL
field.description: Enter the link of the website that is using the Ad Agency component (i.e. http://www.example.com)

field.name: zone_id
field.label: Zone ID
field.description: Enter the ID of the zone that you would like to be seen in this module.
